com.sun.tools.javac.v8.util
类 Context

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.tools.javac.v8.util.Context

public class Context
extends java.lang.Object

Support for an abstract context, modelled loosely after ThreadLocal but using a user-provided context instead of the current thread. Within the compiler, a single Context is used for each invocation of the compiler. The context is then used to ensure a single copy of each compiler phase exists per compiler invocation.

Typical usage pattern is: 

 public class Phase {
        private static final Context.Key<Phase> phaseKey = new Context.Key<Phase>();
 
        public static Phase instance(Context context) {
                Phase instance = context.get(phaseKey);
                if (instance == null)
                        instance = new Phase(context);
                return instance;
        }
 
        protected Phase(Context context) {
                context.put(thaseKey, this);
                // other intitialization follows...
        }
 }

嵌套类摘要
static class Context.Key
          The client creates an instance of this class for each key.
 
构造方法摘要
Context()
           
 
方法摘要
 java.lang.Object get(Context.Key key)
          Get the value for the key in this context.
 void put(Context.Key key, java.lang.Object data)
          Set the value for the key in this context.
 
从类 java.lang.Object 继承的方法
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
